summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of SOUTH WEBSTER STREET from 2nd Avenue South to 4th Avenue South; and from 5th Avenue South to South Riverside Drive; and certain other streets, avenues, and an easement, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6667, and appropriating money from the Municipal Sewerage Revenue Bond 1971 Construction Fund in aid thereof as a loan.
